title: Sentiment Analysis on Amazon Reviews
description: Compared performance of LSTM, BERT, and a custom Transformer model for binary sentiment classification on Amazon product reviews.
achievements: LSTM reached ~92% accuracy on raw data
BERT scored 97% training / 94% validation on FastText dataset
Used lemmatization, stopword removal, and tokenization
Evaluated with F1-score, confusion matrix, and validation curves

title: Project Canario â€“ DevOps Infrastructure Transformation
description: Led the design and implementation of a modern DevOps pipeline to address operational inefficiencies for a celebrity-focused web design agency.
achievements: Automated testing and production releases using GitLab pipelines
Enabled zero-downtime deployments with Docker Swarm
Configured feature toggling using Unleash
Developed a transitional roadmap for DevOps adoption
Promoted best practices in resilience, monitoring, and knowledge sharing

title: Drought Forecasting Using Weather Data in the US
description: Built a machine learning model to predict drought severity based on 20 years of time-series weather and soil data across US counties.
achievements: Performed PCA to reduce dimensionality while preserving 97% of variance
Achieved 63.76% accuracy using Ridge Regression
Visualized elevation-drought correlation across regions
Suggested ensemble models and time-windowed forecasts to improve accuracy

title: 3D Geometry with NeRF and Depth Estimation
description: Built a hybrid pipeline using Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF), MiDaS, and PyTorch3D for 3D reconstruction and volumetric mesh extraction.
achievements: Generated accurate 3D meshes using depth maps and radiance fields
Integrated MiDaS for dense depth estimation
Explored trade-offs between implicit and explicit 3D rendering
Real-time mesh interaction and camera control

title: Emotion Recognition with Live Camera Feed
description: Developed a CNN-based facial emotion recognition system integrated with real-time webcam feed for detecting 7 common emotions.
achievements: Trained on 36,000 grayscale images with balanced class weighting
Live integration with webcam and real-time inference
Hyperparameter tuning with 100+ epochs
Optimized for F1-score across multiple emotion classes

title: React Portfolio Website
description: Developed a dynamic React-based portfolio website to showcase machine learning, DevOps, and frontend development projects.
achievements: Integrated project data dynamically from a structured JSON API
Implemented dark mode toggle and typewriter effects for the hero section
Used Framer Motion for animated scroll and hover transitions
Modular design supports easy future additions and deployment
Deployed using Netlify
